headline: Crown Castle: Upgrading To Buy As The Risk-Reward Shifts, Turnaround Advances
summary: Crown Castle Inc. is upgraded to Buy as valuation and yield become more attractive amid restructuring & debt reductions. Read more on CCI stock here.

headline: American Tower Corporation (AMT) Faces Dish Wireless Lease Default, But Analysts Remain Cautiously Optimistic
summary: American Tower Corporation (NYSE:AMT) is one of Goldman Sachs’ top REIT stock picks. On January 28, in regulatory filings, American Tower Corporation (NYSE:AMT) reiterated that Dish Wireless has defaulted in lease payments. Consequently, the company is in default under the Strategic Collaboration Agreement entered into in 2021. American Tower Corporation insists that the default will […]

headline: 36 U.S. REITs Expected To Raise Dividends In Q1 2026
summary: 36 publicly traded US REITs are projected to increase dividend payouts in the first quarter, according to S&P Global Market Intelligence forecasts.
